ygData.subject: Re: Stupid Rant
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to say the english tradition of giving a middle name is sometimes useless, but it is kool sometimes. Anyhow, you re Kyle to me.

I have to say the english tradition of giving a middle name is 
sometimes useless, but it is kool sometimes. Anyhow, you're Kyle to 
me.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> I hate Robert, I hate Rob, I hate Bobby, and I hate
> Bob.  My name is Kyle.  My first name is only Robert
> because my parents couldn't come up with a middle name
> to go with Kyle.  They always intended it to be Kyle. 
> Kyle came first.
> 
> --- Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Just tell them to call your Rob... it sounds better
> > that way.
> > 
>
